Pre-Game Insights: England will face a must-win clash to keep their semis ambitions alive.
USA, who have been a revelation in the tournament however are still winless in the Super 8s.
Expect England to seal the contest comfortably.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Kensington Oval in Barbados is a good pitch offering equal assistance to both batters and bowlers.
The maximum temperature is expected to be around 32Â°C with 40 percent chance of rainfall.
Others: Adil Rashid can provide important breakthroughs and is expected to get some assistance off the deck too.
Aaron Jones has been in decent form in the tournament. He can score quick runs and can fetch ample fantasy points.
Jos Buttler will open the innings and can also play the role of an anchor. He can score good fantasy points.
Jofra Archer will bowl in different spells and can pick up crucial wickets. He is the highest wicket-taker for England so far in the World Cup.
Phil Salt is an explosive batter and will bat at the top. He can be extremely dangerous if he manages to get going.
